patterns: I wish to exchange my clothes. I bought it 3 days back.Is it possible?
responses: We accept exchanges within 7 days of the purchase. Items bought under offers cannot be exchanged.

patterns: How can I determine the shipping rate?
Tell me something about the shipping rate.
responses: Shipping rates and times depend on the shipping speed and the weight/size of the items. To determine the applicable shipping rate,select proceed to checkout,add your shipping address,select a shipping speed,select a payment method and select continue to know the shipping rates.

patterns: I had ordered 3-4 days back. I have not received it.
How do I check when I will receive my order?
responses: Go to Your Orders,click on the order you want to track,select Track Package next to your order.Now you can check out all the delivery updates.

patterns: I heard about Amazon Fresh somewhere.Pls explain it.
responses: Prime and Non-Prime members in select cities can shop for groceries, everyday essentials, and more with Amazon Fresh. Amazon Fresh offers Attended Delivery and Unattended Delivery, with Pickup options in select cities.Visit Amazon.com/Fresh to see if delivery or pickup is available in your area.

patterns: Please explain what are Amazon Gift Cards.
responses: An amazon gift card is a card that has already been loaded with a set amount of money and then sent out to the receiver. The receiver could be anyone. It could be a gift to your partner, best friend and anyone. Amazon gift cards can be purchased in almost any amount from $0.50 to $2000. Amazon gift cards can be redeemed on Amazon for anything on Amazon.
